page.title: 10SILVER PAINT AND LAQUER
page.content: {KALON} which was formerly S.P.L. (Silver paint and laquer company) is just off the Birstall traffic lights going towards Huddersfield. It has been a large help in the employment market in Batley and Birstall. The area of the site is 65000 square metres and employs over 1000 workers. There are three factories owned by Mr. Silvers, { 1) Old Admiral Mill {2) S.P.L.} on George St. and{3) Kalon. S.P.L. first started when Mr. Silvers came out of the air force in 1947 and couldn't find any other work so he started a small firm of 10 people making paint on Bradford Road. He started making paint because Batley and Birstall were textile towns and that was dying out. Originally the paint was hand made but now everything was automated. All the firms data is now stored on computer.
